casebody.data:
STATE FARM FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
DETROIT EDISON CO., Also Known as DTE Electric Company, Defendant-Appellant. Jane Bott, Individually, and the Estate of William Bott, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Detroit Edison Co., Also Known as DTE Electric Company, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158265, 158266
SC: 158267
COA: 332454, 333281
COA: 333287 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 5, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on November 29, 2018, is accepted as timely filed.
